meanings.definition: A type of hat with a narrow brim and indented crown.
meanings.sent1: He tipped his trilbied to greet the lady.
meanings.sent2: The detective always wore his trilbied when solving mysteries.
meanings.sent3: The trilbied sat jauntily on his head, giving him a stylish look.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of hats, her trilbied stood out like a unique crown.
meanings.sent5: The trilbied shielded his eyes from the sun, making him look dapper.

meanings.definition: To wear or don a trilby hat.
meanings.sent1: She trilbied her favorite hat for the special occasion.
meanings.sent2: Every Sunday, he trilbies his trilby to church.
meanings.sent3: The magician trilbied his hat, ready to pull out a surprise.
meanings.sent4: She trilbied the hat with confidence, completing her outfit.
meanings.sent5: He trilbied the hat, transforming his look instantly.
